name: Alli Connect
description: Thrivelution solves for patient churn in mental health by increasing engagement and retention 2.5X. We achieve this by clinically matching Patients to Therapists using our intelligent matching SaaS solution.
one_liner: Thrivelution solves for patient churn in mental health by increasing engagement and retention 2.5X. We achieve this by clinically matching Patients to Therapists using our intelligent matching SaaS solution.
